ygData.subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Digest Number 368
ygData.msgSnippet: -- Mark Rafn    dagon@dagon.net     Hi all, new to the board, first post. Cazic on Steroids
ygData.messageBody:
<< Where did everyone go after Cazic? >>
--
Mark Rafn    dagon@...    <http://www.dagon.net/>

Hi all, new to the board, first post.

Cazic on Steroids > Temple of Droga / 3rd Level of Dalnir / Charming Giants in the Giant Fort in Frontier Mountains.

Droga is usually impossible to find a pick up group within the zone. I usually bring a couple of friends and recruit in /ooc from Overthere and Frontier Mountain outdoor zones. 3rd Level of Dalnir is tough for the same reasons as above. Also, getting to the portal for non - gaters can be very tough, need a Cleric / Druid / Wizzy and Invis is a must.

Easy to get in a Giant Charming group. I've kept the same pet in there for an hour plus on a few occasions. Good for refining our Charming skills.

Side note: What do you all charge to enchant metals?

Silver Bars

Electrum Bars

Gold Bars

Platinum Bars

and Later Velium Bars?

Neutron Dreamslayer - 35th Level DE Enchanter, Lanys
